articles.description: Nation's leading infectious diseases expert,tells CBS News he finds failure to abide by guidance discouraging mass gatherings "disturbing."
articles.content: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's leading infectious diseases expert, is frustrated about the nation's inability to stop the continued spread of coronavirus, which he says is largely because Americans … [+3617 chars]

articles.title: What Paschall learned about Steph during rookie season - Comcast SportsNet Bay Area
articles.description: Eric Paschall only played five games with Steph Curry but he still learned something about the two-time MVP.
articles.content: Draymond Green won two state championships in high school before attending Michigan State for four years, over which he and the Spartans went 107-39 and reached two Final Fours. Upon entering the NBA… [+2301 chars]

articles.author: Jabari Young
articles.title: MLB's latest tactic to start its season comes courtesy of Dr. Anthony Fauci - CNBC
articles.description: Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred rejected the players union proposal of a 70-game season as both sides continue to its battle to start the 2020 season suspended by Covid-19.
articles.content:
Hoping to get Major League Baseball on track to start its season paused due to Covid-19, league commissioner Rob Manfred wasted no time using the nation's top disease expert, Dr. Anthony Fauci.
